title: Chocolate cherry beer cake
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '150g butter', '400g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '60g cooking chocolate, melted', '250ml beer', '175g buttermilk', '60ml cherry juice', '250g cherries, stones removed and halved', '120g chopped walnuts', '150g butter', '1 egg', '110g cooking chocolate, melted', '500g icing sugar, sifted', '3 tablespoons milk']
